title: Shared Ownership with Rust Arc
description: In this lab, we explore the usage of Arc (Atomically Reference Counted) in Rust, which is employed when shared ownership between threads is required.

meta.title: Shared Ownership with Rust Arc: Exploring Atomic Reference Counting
meta.description: Learn how to use Rust's Arc (Atomically Reference Counted) for shared ownership between threads.
meta.keywords: rust playground, multithreading, shared ownership, rust tutor, rust online compiler, arc, rust commands, atomic reference counting, rust practice, rust online
